properties.description:
Will always be loaded as full.

- For full load use:
Parameter tables = 
["{
'schema':'GESTAORH',
'table':'rhpont_res_sit_dia',
'load_type':'incremental',
'partition_column':'null',
'control_column':'DT_ULT_ALTER_USUA',
'control_column_type_2_db':'datetime',
'control_column_default_value': '19000101000000',
'control_column_mask_value':'DD/MM/YYHH24:MI:SSFF',
'columns':' * ',
'raw': {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'YEAR','implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'YEAR\\',functions.year(functions.col(\\'DATA\\')))'}]}}"]

Execute pipeline = template_import_table_incremental

As this object is really small, you can add: 'raw':{'coalesce': 1}

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables
